CustomField.formula:
IF (
AND( $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission,OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Language Approved") ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementReturnToRequestor?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/markassigned.png", "Ready for Signatures"),"_self"),NULL)
CustomField.label: Ready for Signatures
